messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: What's going on?? (I wouldn't  worry)
messages.msgSnippet: I ve been getting them all day today.  I m just deleting them. Kristen ... From: marji To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, February 26,
messages.messageBody:
I've been getting them all day today. I'm just deleting them.

Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: marji
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, February 26, 2003 7:27 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: What's going on?? (I wouldn't worry)


I was getting those "quarantined" messages the other night. I wouldn't
worry about it. I think yahoo or some other layer of provider is hiccuping
and sending out weird messages. I emailed Joyce about the messages the
other night, and she didn't really know what was going on, but it doesn't
seem to be affecting anyone's ability to post. Weird, though.

Marji

At 00:23 2/27/03 +0000, you wrote:
>--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, "sorcha_aisling
><sorcha-aisling@i...>" <sorcha-aisling@i...> wrote:
> > My last message seems to have posted but I got an email
>saying it was
> > being quarantined for containing banned content!
>
>I got a similar message and my message posted just fine and
>all it was was a thank you!
>
>Not sure what's up...
